definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: [[יְעוּאֵל]] son of Zerah 1Ch 9:6, LXX Epeihl, A LXXL Iehl.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a companion of Ezra Ezr 8:13, LXXL Ieihl.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a chief of the Reubenites 1Ch 5:7, LXX Iwhl.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: one of those who took strange wives Ezr 10:43, LXX Iahl, Ieihl, etc.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: man of Gibeon, ancestor of Saul 1Ch 9:35, LXX Ihl, Ie(i)hl.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: one of David's heroes 1Ch 11:44, LXX (I)eia, A LXXL Ieihl.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: the [[סוֹפֵר]] (q.v.) of King Uzziah 2Ch 26:11, LXX Ieihl.
